LanguageData.Sugar.label: sugar
LanguageData.Sugar.description: Sugar is the milled product of Sugarcanes. It is used in baking, typically for desserts and candies.
LanguageData.Flour.label: flour
LanguageData.Flour.description: Flour ground from raw Wheat or Oats. It can be used for baking breads.
LanguageData.Milk.label: milk
LanguageData.Milk.description: Milk is a pale liquid produced by the mammary glands of mammals. It can be consumed as a beverage.
LanguageData.InsectJelly.label: insect jelly
LanguageData.InsectJelly.description: Jelly stored and used as food by oversized insects. It is smooth, rich, and brings joy to those who consume it. Because of its unique biological properties, it can nourish almost any creature and never rots.
LanguageData.SoyMilk.label: soy milk
LanguageData.SoyMilk.description: Soy milk is a pale liquid produced from grinding Beans. It is similar to an animal's milk, just produced from plants instead.
LanguageData.coconutmilk.label: coconut milk
LanguageData.coconutmilk.description: Milk harvested from the coconut fruit.
LanguageData.Tofu.label: tofu
LanguageData.Tofu.description: Raw protein-rich tofu, produced from bean pods. Acceptable to eat when raw.
